text: 16.4: Mt 12.39; Ru 11.29Nde ntige, vhuuŋgia ki gumgi gu mbigi, nde gumgi gu mbigi mbatɨgi ma. Nde guigira wari won ndavir Fhe Bakɨme nɨɨŋgi fhuvara. Mbe zazera mirikori ga nzuav nzai. Mbe nzai mbe mirikor the gangirga tuktɨgi fhuvara. Mbe ganɨnga mirikor bavira Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ guma Zona ana muuŋgi.” Zisas mba kamen mbe suaŋgiap, mbe thav vui.
